Addon urban planning and policy simulation Tropico 4, in which El Presidente will finish building communism on the island paradise in our own time, the Internet and iPhones. The developers propose to pass a new campaign of 12 missions, 10 new buildings, among which is the launch site and the office building, as well as 10 presidential decrees, and not very democratic, allow us to solve various social problems faced by citizens of El Tropico.
